description:
Breeze through your longest trail runs in lightweight waterproof running shoes. Seamless design and internal fit sleeves let you run sockless if you want to (you do you). A rock plate and toecap protect forefoot and toes from rocks and roots, and a responsive foam midsole cushions your landing and lets you use that energy for the next step.

  • Durable anti-debris mesh provides a secure fit
  • GORE-TEX® Invisible Fit technology provides reliable waterproofing with outstanding breathability
  • Internal SensiFit™ offers a performance fit ideal for high-output activity
  • Quicklace® closure provides a secure fit with a single pull and includes a lace pocket
  • OptiVibe midsole provides durable shock absorption and reduces vibration through the sole
  • Profeel Film protects the base of your foot from sharp objects
  • Contagrip® outsole is designed for varied terrain with reliable grip on wet or rocky trails
name: Salomon Sense Ride 5 Gore-Tex Trail Running Shoes - Men's
